outpack.server 0.1.2
  • Reference

outpack.server

This is an implementation of the outpack HTTP API as an R package using porcelain and plumber. We will probably replace this with a higher performance implementation later, but keep the interface the same.

Usage

Assuming that you have an outpack repository at path:

docker run -v ${PWD}/path:/outpack -p 8001:8001 mrcide/outpack.server:prototype /outpack

Responses 

## ℹ Loading outpack.server

GET / 

    "status": "success",
    "errors": null,
    "data": {
        "outpack": "0.1.4",
        "outpack.server": "0.1.0"
    }
}

GET /file/

json1f 8b 08 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 ...

Installation

To install outpack.server:

remotes::install_github("mrc-ide/outpack.server", upgrade = FALSE)
